# Glacial Ward, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 14]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a pinch of sulfur), Coldfire (1 ounce of coldfire)

**Range:** 10 ft.

**Area:** 10-ft.-radius spherical emanation, centered on you

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 96

A 10-foot-radius globe of swirling coldfi re surrounds you, granting you and anyone inside the globe spell resistance 25 against all fire spells and spell-like effects. In addition, any creature using a fire-based supernatural ability on a target inside the globe (such as a breath weapon) must also make a caster level check to affect the target. The globe does not offer protection against natural heat and fire, including immersion in lava.
